project.name: VitamCourriel
project.description: Test to interface Droid and Jhove and Exif and various elements for EML, MSG, MBOX, PST files handling within Vitam

echo.message: // DO NOT MODIFY - WILL BE OVERWRITTEN DURING THE BUILD PROCESS${line.separator}package fr.gouv.culture.vitam.utils;${line.separator}/** Provides the version information of VitamTool. */${line.separator}public final class Version {${line.separator} /** The version identifier. */${line.separator} public static final String ID = "${project.version}";${line.separator} /** Prints out the version identifier to stdout. */${line.separator} public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println(ID); }${line.separator} private Version() { super(); }${line.separator}}${line.separator}

configuration.author: true
configuration.additionalparam:
-link http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/
-group "VitamTool Gui package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.gui*" -group "VitamTool Command package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.command*" -group "VitamTool Sax Handlers package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.saxhandlers*" -group "VitamTool Utils package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.utils*" -group "VitamTool Digest package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.digest*" -group "VitamTool Extractor package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.extract*" -group "VitamTool Extractor for Email package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.eml*" -group "VitamTool PDF/A package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.pdfa*" -group "VitamTool Droid package" "fr.gouv.culture.vitam.droid*" -group "VitamTool Droid extension package" "uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid*"
-sourceclasspath ${basedir}/target/classes
